playlists.name: Spotify Jn. Kerala
playlists.description: A niche playlist showcasing Malayalam hip hop and hypertechno

playlists.name: Summer Pulse
playlists.description: Summer Pulse delivers a vibrant Afro house experience, perfect for sunny days and energetic vibes. A strong selection with a consistent sound

playlists.name: Techno Essentials (Melodic Techno)
playlists.description: A strong selection of melodic techno, perfect for deep listening or setting a sophisticated mood.

playlists.name: EDM in Kerala
playlists.description: A vibrant collection showcasing Kerala's EDM scene, blending local influences with electronic beats. A promising and unique listening experience
playlists.sub-genre: Malayalam Hip Hop, Malayalam Pop, Mollywood

playlists.name: Electronic Gem
playlists.description: A solid collection of Indian indie and Malayalam hip hop.
playlists.sub-genre: Malayalam Hip Hop, Tamil Indie, Indian Indie

playlists.name: Southern Railway (Hip Hop/ Rap)
playlists.description: A solid collection of Malayalam hip hop and rap, showcasing rising artists in the Mollywood scene
playlists.sub-genre: Malayalam Hip Hop, Malayalam Pop, Mollywood

playlists.name: Six Eight Things
playlists.description: A vibrant collection of Malayalam hip-hop and pop, featuring popular artists like Dabzee and Rish NK. Great for fans of Mollywood music
playlists.sub-genre: Malayalam Hip Hop, Malayalam Pop, Mollywood

playlists.name: Ocean Deep (R&B)
playlists.description: A short R&B playlist showcasing Indian indie and hip-hop influences, ideal for discovering new artists in the genre

playlists.name: Dance Music India 2025
playlists.description: A vibrant mix of hypertechno, big room, and Indian influences. Perfect for high-energy dance floors and discovering emerging sounds
playlists.sub-genre: Hypertechno, Malayalam hip hop, Big Room

playlists.name: Indian Groove 2025
playlists.description: A vibrant mix of future, tech, and G-House influences creates an energetic playlist, perfect for those seeking an Indian-inspired groove

playlists.name: Halloween 2025
playlists.description: A high-energy Halloween mix! Perfect for dancing with ghosts, this playlist blends creepy vibes with fun, danceable EDM tracks

playlists.name: Onam Mood Party Hits
